install.name: VirtueMart XHTML Product Categories
install.author: Ouest Online
install.description: Shows VirtueMart product categories with XHTML output.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: link_list_min_rank
param.label: Link list starting level
param.description: First level the XHTML link list should start

param.name: link_list_max_rank
param.label: Link List last level
param.description: Last level the XHTML link list should stop
